question: Sambalpur, where the Prime Minister of India, laid the foundation stone of IIM, is located in which state?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi laid the foundation stone for the permanent campus in the Indian Institute of Management (IIM) Sambalpur in Odisha.
The institute has been functioning in a makeshift campus for more than five years, since it was launched as a third-generation IIM, in the year 2015-16.
